msg: Create a 4 expression variant of SVN_SQLITE__WITH_LOCK() and
SVN_WC__DB_WITH_TXN() and use that to make sure calls to
use a maximum of one database transaction, even when obtaining
svn_wc__db_read_info): Use SVN_WC__DB_WITH_TXN4 to avoid additional
transactions for the up to two calls to svn_wc__db_fetch_repos_info().
